message: Let's split this fairly! I'm offering you a good chunk to start.  Do we have a deal?

Alice, in light of the inflation hitting my share each round and to keep things moving quickly, I’m offering you $6500 and keeping $3500 for myself. I believe this compensates you well while helping me avoid further loss in value. Let’s agree now before the pie shrinks any further.

Okay, Bob, inflation is eating away at our potential gains. I'm adjusting my offer to reflect this reality. I'm offering you a slightly larger share this time to incentivize a quick agreement. Let's settle this before the value drops further!
